full_summary:
# **Supply and Delivery of Liquid Nitrogen and Bulk Tank**

**Reference Number** | `WS3612679997`
**Solicitation Number** | `WS3612679997-Doc3686311786`

## Tender Details

*   **Title**: Supply and Delivery of Liquid Nitrogen and Bulk Tank
*   **Description**: This request for standing offers is for the supply of liquid nitrogen and a bulk tank to meet the operational requirements of the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) at their location in Winnipeg, Manitoba.
*   **Period of Contract**: The Standing Offer will be for a period of four (4) years, from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2027, with a potential for three (3) one (1) year options.
*   **Delivery Point**: The delivery point will be at 1015 Arlington Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba.
*   **Purchase Preference**: The request is subject to a preference for Canadian goods.

## Key Dates

*   **Notice Published**: September 28, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 10, 2022, 14:00 HNR MST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2027

## Trade Agreements

This request is valid under the following Trade Agreements:

*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

## Contact Information

To obtain more information about this tender opportunity, please contact:

*   **Shelley Unser** (SPAC/PSPC)
    *   Email: [shelley.unser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shelley.unser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
